Package twcore.core.game

Interface Summary
InvalidShipListener Interface for use with ShipRestrictor to allow classes to receive notification of a player attempting to change ships and then not being allowed.
ShipRestrictor The ShipRestrictor interface defines a set of methods to be used by the integrated ship access control in the Team class.
 

Class Summary
Arena Arena is used to keep track of player information in the Arena a bot is in.
BasicRestrictor Basic implementation of the ShipRestrictor interface.
CompoundRestrictor A more flexible implementation of the ShipRestrictor interface, allows you to define ship groups and assign a maximum value to each group.
Flag  
Player The essential class holding information on a single Subspace player.
Projectile SpaceBall Projectile class
Ship Representation of the bot as as a Subspace ship for in-game playing.
SpaceShip Moves bot from location to another and detects hits.
Team Represents a team of players.
